alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cimarron and northwestern Dallam Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Seneca, or 14 miles northeast of Clayton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boise City, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park and Felt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
